text.p: The following reports appeared in Lithuania's newspapers on Wednesday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.

- Lithuanian police and state security officials made a record seizure of 118,000 litres of contraband alcohol in the Raseiniai region. Police suspect the gang involved was illegally importing 900 tonnes of spirits a month.
- Vilniaus Bank's share price climbed five percent to 1,050 litas on the Vilnius Stock Exchange on Tuesday.
- Police arrested six members of a car theft ring led by a former Cuban soldier.
- Lithuanian economists say the 22 percent coupon on a 200 million litas bond being distributed by Merrill Lynch is too high.
